name: Project Matching
description:
This is an open source platform for matching teammates to projects using stable marriage. This was a product of COVID ðŸ¦ !

I built the pilot with the FERN stack with my team and with great feedback from our beta-testers, we started building the final version.

The current version is built in Rails in collab with DSC UMass, UIUC and NTU and supports Slack-like versioning for each org.
